text: Sipas ʙa'di Nūh pajomʙarone ( cun Hud, Soleh, Iʙrohim, Lut va Şuajʙ va digaronro) ʙar qavmaşon firistodem va onon dalelhoi ravşane ovardand ʙar haq ʙudani pajomʙariaşon, vale mardum ʙa on cī peş az on durūƣ ʙarovarda ʙudand, nasihathoi pajomʙaronro qaʙul nakardand va imon naovarda ʙudand. Hamcunin ʙar dilhoi taçovuzkoron mūhr menihem
